name: LineHighlight
tagline: A bookmarklet to highlight the text line a user has clicked on.
body:
LineHighlight is a simple bookmarklet that highlights (in yellow) the text line the user clicks on.

It is intended as a tool primarily for persons with dyslexia, but can be useful for other purposes as well.

The software is in early beta, so there are bugs. For some reason some lines do not highlight. Bug reports and feature requests are most welcome.

To use this bookmarklet make a new bookmark with the following address:

`javascript:(function(){document.body.appendChild(document.createElement('script')).src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ICTEnablers/LineHighlight/master/LineHighlight.js?v='+parseInt(Math.random()*99999999);})();`

You can call the bookmark whatever you like. To use it, open the page you wish to use it on and click on the bookmark.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
